custom_padding_tablet=”|0%|0px|0%|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|0%|20px|0%|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The legal technology market is crowded with vendors offering software solutions that are task-specific, provide limited functionality, or are too disruptive to the workflow of legal teams.

But AllRize is different. It is a comprehensive and configurable law practice management platform that was purpose-built by lawyers – for lawyers. Simply stated, we designed AllRize to help law firms and in-house legal teams streamline internal operations, increase staff productivity, and deliver superior service to clients.

There are five distinct capabilities that, together, separate AllRize from other law practice software products on the market.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” scroll_horizontal_motion_enable=”on” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|50|50|100|2|0|0″ custom_css_main_element=”margin-top:auto;||margin-bottom:auto;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://allrize.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/Support-Your-Legal-Practice.webp” title_text=”Support Your Legal Practice” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” scroll_vertical_motion_enable=”on” scroll_vertical_motion=”0|50|50|100|1|0|0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#10519B” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”1. Complete Practice Management” closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” toggle_icon=”||divi||400″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”1px” open_icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”1px” admin_label=”1. Complete Practice Management” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#10519B” title_level=”h3″ title_font=”Poppins|700|||||||” title_font_size=”16px” title_line_height=”26px” body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”25px” custom_css_toggle_title=”padding:0px!important;” border_width_all=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}” open_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” open_toggle_background_color__hover=”#d9f4fc” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”#d9f4fc” title_text_color__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” title_text_color__hover=”#FFFFFF”]Say goodbye to juggling outdated, disjointed tools. AllRize offers an all-in-one Law Practice Management solution that integrates essential functions like marketing, client intake, matter management, and accounting. By bringing these features together in one seamless platform, AllRize helps your firm streamline workflows, enhance team collaboration, and deliver exceptional client experiences. Plus, we’re committed to continuous innovation, adding new features based on your evolving needs.[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#10519B” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”2. Modular, Scalable Platform” closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” toggle_icon=”||divi||400″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”1px” open_icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”1px” admin_label=”2. Modular Platform Architecture” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#10519B” title_level=”h3″ title_font=”Poppins|700|||||||” title_font_size=”16px” title_line_height=”26px” body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”25px” custom_css_toggle_title=”padding:0px!important;” border_width_all=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”#d9f4fc” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]Our cutting-edge platform is built on a high-performance, open architecture designed for scalability and flexibility. With modular capabilities, AllRize empowers you to customize the solution to meet your firm’s specific needs. Expand functionality effortlessly as your firm grows, and enjoy seamless integration with your existing software. From automation to AI-powered tools, AllRize offers the tools you need today – and tomorrow.[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#10519B” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”3. Cloud-Native SaaS Solution” closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” toggle_icon=”||divi||400″ open_icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” admin_label=”3. SaaS-Based Software Offering” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#10519B” title_level=”h3″ title_font=”Poppins|700|||||||” title_font_size=”16px” title_line_height=”26px” body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”25px” custom_css_toggle_title=”padding:0px!important;” border_width_all=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”#d9f4fc” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]Simplify IT management and enhance security with AllRize’s cloud-native platform, powered by Microsoft Azure. Our subscription-based model eliminates the need for costly on-premises servers while ensuring continuous updates and top-tier security. Whether your team is local or remote, AllRize provides secure, anytime, anywhere access, enabling you to attract and retain top talent regardless of location.[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” scroll_vertical_motion_enable=”on” scroll_vertical_motion=”0|50|50|100|1|0|0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”width: 16.7%!important;||margin-right: 3%!important;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”width:33.3%!important;||margin-right: 3%!important;” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#10519B” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”4. Microsoft Dynamics Integration” closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” toggle_icon=”||divi||400″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”1px” open_icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”1px” admin_label=”4. Microsoft Dynamics Integration” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#10519B” title_level=”h3″ title_font=”Poppins|700|||||||” title_font_size=”16px” title_line_height=”26px” body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”25px” custom_css_toggle_title=”padding:0px!important;” border_width_all=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”#d9f4fc” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]With more law firms relying on Microsoft technology than any other, AllRize is proud to be a Microsoft partner. Our platform integrates seamlessly with Microsoft Dynamics 365, leveraging Microsoft’s $30 billion annual R&D investment to deliver the latest innovations directly to your firm. This partnership means you benefit from a constantly evolving suite of features without the need for manual upgrades – innovation at your fingertips.[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”width: 33.3%!important;||margin-right: 3%!important;” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#10519B” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”5. Unparalleled Expertise in Legal Tech” closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” toggle_icon=”||divi||400″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”1px” open_icon_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”1px” admin_label=”5. AllRize Engineering Expertise” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#10519B” title_level=”h3″ title_font=”Poppins|700|||||||” title_font_size=”16px” title_line_height=”26px” body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”25px” custom_css_toggle_title=”padding:0px!important;” border_width_all=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”#d9f4fc” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]AllRize’s engineering team combines extensive experience in legal workflows with Microsoft’s industry-leading technologies, including the groundbreaking Copilot AI engine. This unique synergy allows us to create solutions tailored specifically to the legal industry, empowering your firm with automation and intelligence that drive efficiency and business growth.[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”width: 16.7%!important;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” scroll_vertical_motion_enable=”on” scroll_vertical_motion=”0|50|50|100|1|0|0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#10519B” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”4. This partnership means you benefit from a constantly evolving suite of features without the need for manual upgrades – innovation at your fingertips.[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#10519B” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”5. AllRize Engineering Expertise” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#10519B” title_level=”h3″ title_font=”Poppins|700|||||||” title_font_size=”16px” title_line_height=”26px” body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”25px” custom_css_toggle_title=”padding:0px!important;” border_width_all=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”#d9f4fc” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]AllRize’s engineering team combines extensive experience in legal workflows with Microsoft’s industry-leading technologies, including the groundbreaking Copilot AI engine. This unique synergy allows us to create solutions tailored specifically to the legal industry, empowering your firm with automation and intelligence that drive efficiency and business growth.[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” text_text_color=”#575d6b” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”28px” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” custom_padding_tablet=”|0%||0%|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|0%||0%|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]

1. Complete Practice Management

Too many law firms rely on a disparate set of software tools that are often outdated and rarely work well together. This results in wasted time and operational inefficiencies that can negatively impact firms in many ways. In contrast, AllRize is a comprehensive Law Practice Management solution that seamlessly integrates multiple functions – such as marketing, client intake, matter management, accounting, and much more – into one seamlessly integrated software solution. This unmatched functional integration helps streamline workflows, enhance team collaboration, improve firm productivity, and deliver a superior client experience. And rest assured, new capabilities will continually be added to AllRize based on the needs of our customers.

2. Modular Platform Architecture

The AllRize engineering team spent nearly 10 man-years building an innovative software solution based on a highly scalable, open platform architecture. This architecture provides a foundation that supports multiple software modules and delivers superior AI intelligence and automation to each software module. The result is a software solution that provides unmatched flexibility to customers, enabling them to configure the solution with exactly the capabilities they require, then add more functionality whenever it’s needed. The platform also includes out-of-the-box integrations that enable law firms to leverage their existing software tools as needed.

3. SaaS-Based Software Offering

AllRize was designed as a cloud-native application, hosted on Microsoft Azure and delivered over the Internet as a subscription-based software service. This delivery model eliminates the need for costly servers that can clutter law firm offices and create security vulnerabilities. And software updates happen automatically and continuously, without any need for legal staff to be involved. Lastly, it also enables secure access to AllRize by local and remote users – anywhere, anytime, which means that law firms can hire the best talent, regardless of where they are located.

4. Microsoft Dynamics Integration

More law firms build their digital foundation on Microsoft technology than any other vendor. For that reason, AllRize became a Microsoft partner and developed a platform that is deeply integrated with Microsoft Dynamics 365 technology. Why is that important? Microsoft invests nearly $30B annually in R&D for its vast suite of software solutions, including Microsoft Dynamics. These ongoing investments result in a steady stream of new technological innovations, many of which are continuously added to Dynamics. As a result, these new Microsoft innovations are automatically made available to every AllRize customer because, again, the platform is literally integrated with Microsoft Dynamics.

5. AllRize Engineering Expertise

Lastly, our software engineering team continuously leverages and adapts Microsoft technologies (including the market-leading Copilot AI engine) to develop new AllRize features and functions specifically optimized for the legal market. This combination of Microsoft R&D and AllRize expertise in legal workflows and processes is unmatched in the legal tech market. And it allows us to achieve our goal: to empower every legal team with the automation and intelligence required to improve their operational efficiency and accelerate the growth of their business.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Source Sans Pro|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#10519B” text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”34px” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” custom_padding_tablet=”|0%||0%|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|0%||0%|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The final verdict is this: AllRize is the most complete, most intelligent, and most flexible Law Practice Management solution available.

CRM

Marketing

Provides tools to build brand awareness, launch marketing campaigns, attract and retain more clients, and manage social media and website content – all with the goal of growing business revenue.

Accounting

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” scroll_horizontal_motion_enable=”on” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|50|50|100|-2|0|0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”Pricing” admin_label=”Pricing” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ title_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” title_text_align=”left” title_text_color=”#10519b” title_font_size=”32px” title_line_height=”42px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” title_font_size_tablet=”28px” title_font_size_phone=”28px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” title_line_height_tablet=”38px” title_line_height_phone=”38px” title_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” text_text_color=”#575d6b” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”28px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

AllRize pricing is based on the modules the organization requires and the number of users that need access to the SaaS offering. Organizations can choose month-to-month pricing, or more cost-effective 1-year and 3-year subscriptions. Every AllRize customer also receives complimentary service and support for the first 12 months.

In addition, the AllRize Customer Experience team provides a broad set of professional services, including migration from legacy systems, as well as installation, configuration, and training on the AllRize platform.

Please contact us to request more details on pricing, and a customized quote for your organization.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” scroll_horizontal_motion_enable=”on” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|50|50|100|2|0|0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://allrize.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/Pricing.jpg” alt=”AllRize Platform
” title_text=”AllRize Platform” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|20px|20px|20px|20px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#ededed” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_4,1_4″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Source Sans Pro|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#005fac” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”28px” global_colors_info=”{}”]Ready to learn more?
